N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 690.21 - Orientation to the profession

State Regulations
(a) Orientation program. This court
shall regularly conduct an orientation program on the subject of professional
ethics and related topics for applicants seeking admission to practice as
attorneys and counselors-at-law. (b) Required attendance. Every person
admitted to the practice of law after January 1, 2006, shall have attended and
successfully completed such an orientation program within one year prior to the
date of admission. (c) Waivers. The Presiding Justice or
his or her designee may, in individual cases involving undue hardship or
extenuating circumstances, upon written request, grant waivers and
modifications of this requirement. Notes
